definitions.definition: A sudden movement or gesture of shrinking away .
A reel used in dyeing , steeping , or washing cloth ; a winch . It is placed over the division wall between two wince pits so as to allow the cloth to descend into either compartment at will.

main_definition: A sudden movement or gesture of shrinking away .
secondary_definitions: A reel used in dyeing , steeping , or washing cloth ; a winch . It is placed over the division wall between two wince pits so as to allow the cloth to descend into either compartment at will.
